head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MORRIS, LESTER J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MORRIS, LESTER J.

block.p: MORRIS-Lester J. Of Bloomfield Hills, MI, and Palm Beach, FL. Beloved husband of Jewell Prentis Morris. Dear father of Patrice (Dr. Eric) Phillips, Robert Prentis Morris and good friend JoAnn Ross and the late Jimmy Prentis Morris. Loving grandpa of Jennifer and Rachel Phillips. Brother of Beatrice Smith of New York. Services are being held today in Detroit. For information call the Ira Kaufman Chapel, 1-800-325-7105.
